title: Free Democratic Party (Northern Cyprus)
text:
The Free Democratic Party (, HDP), was a <a href="center-right">center-right</a> <a href="Liberal%20democracy">liberal</a> <a href="list%20of%20political%20parties%20in%20Northern%20Cyprus">political party</a> in <a href="Turkish%20Republic%20of%20Northern%20Cyprus">Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus</a>. The party was founded after <a href="1990%20Northern%20Cyprus%20parliamentary%20election">1990 elections</a> by <a href="%C4%B0smet%20Kotak">İsmet Kotak</a>.
The Free Democratic Party was successor of the <a href="Progressive%20People%27s%20Party%20%28Northern%20Cyprus%29">Progressive People's Party</a> and its <a href="Electoral%20alliance">electoral bloc</a> <a href="Democratic%20Struggle%20Party">Democratic Struggle Party</a>. After dissolution of the Free Democratic Party, founder İsmet Kotak and his friends joined the <a href="Democratic%20Party%20%28Northern%20Cyprus%29">Democratic Party</a>.
